text: Otter Media Holdings, LLC is an American digital media company. It is owned by Warner Bros. Discovery. It owns Rooster Teeth. It holds an ownership stake in Gunpowder & Sky with Floris Bauer. Until 2022, the company was owned by AT&T; subsidiary WarnerMedia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Companies based in Santa Monica, California
title: Otter Media
